dict.acceptation: 一群；包裹；（纸牌的）一副；一组；
（把…）打包；塞进；拥进；（使）聚集成团；
包装；紧挤在一起；便于折叠收藏的；匆忙离去（有时与 off 连用）；

sent.orig: Wipe the battery pack with mild cleaning solution. Do not immerse the battery pack.
sent.trans: 用中性的清洁剂溶液擦拭电池外壳。不要将电池浸泡在清洗液中。

sent.orig: Dogs are pack animals and strange dogs are not part of our family pack.
sent.trans: 狗儿是群居动物，陌生狗不是我们家庭群体的一员。

sent.orig: PACK The camper had cooking equipment in his pack.
sent.trans: 那露营者的背包里有烹饪装备。

sent.orig: DIRECTIONS OF USE: Take a pack and gently wipe over the face and pack after use.
sent.trans: 适用肤质：取一片洁颜布在脸上轻轻擦拭，即可轻松卸除脸部彩妆及污垢。

sent.orig: Failed to initiate the system language pack. Please make sure the language pack file exists.
sent.trans: 系统语言包初始化失败。请确认语言包文件存在。
